name: Lost Treasure
description: Find the treasure marked on an old map.
You must visit three locations in order.

dialogs.explorer1: Look at this old map. They say legendary treasure is hidden here.
dialogs.explorer2: I'm too old to search for it myself.
dialogs.explorer3: If you visit the three marked locations in order, you'll find the treasure.
dialogs.explorer4: When you find the treasure, keep some for yourself. Just bring me the rest.
